alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 24 at 3:46PM AKST until December 26 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down power lines. Power outages may occur. Building could be damaged. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase again tonight and remain strong into Monday.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
